example.name: Transitive
example.text: He supports Red Education *PRO* to recalibrate the outlook on life and values of contemporary college students, and to encourage college students of the capital to exert themselves for the great revival of the Chinese nation.
example.arg: the outlook on life and values of contemporary college students

predicate.note: Frames file for 'calibrate' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No Verbnet entry.
